page.title: 11A YOUNG BURWELL ATHLETE.
page.content: { Jonathan Ridgeon}is one of the youngest international sportsmen in Britain.He has run{the fastest 100m {in Britain}this year.His time was 10.03 seconds.He also smashed the record for the Southern Men's League 110 metre hurdles.The time of 13.07 cut half a second off the record set by the UK Champion, Wilbert Greaves. He recently won a{bronze medal}for hurdling at{The World Indoor Games in Paris. In the winter he trains twice a week and in the summer 5 times a week with{Harringay A.C.} If he gets into the{1988 Olympics}team he hopes to win in the 110 metres hurdles. He also gained a place at{Cambridge } {University}to read Geography.
